title: Pixel 3 "Cant load Android system" December Update
content:
Hello! After the December update I got a black screen on my Pixel 3, it is showing "cannot load the android system. your data may need to perform a factory data reset" my Pixel 3 was working perfectly fine before this update.
I have tried side loading the latest OTA update and the same black screen showed up. Is there any other way to fix it without factory reset?
